Articles.Content:
So, I'm working on a ship and uh, i think the kraken doesn't want this "massive" of a ship to orbit kerbin in its full glory and epicosity. lol.

THE KRAKEN.......

.......WAS HERE....

Javascript is disabled. View full album

- - - Updated - - -

My reaction when this happened was exactly this: "Errr..... these... poor kerbals..... better take a screenshot!"

Those poor kerbals!

You may want to revise its construction. The way the metal plates are placed effects them a lot. As your look like they overlap the Kraken considers them a delicacy!
A crapload of struts usually helps too
this actually might be good aestetics wise... on the inside. the outside was......interesting

A crapload of struts usually helps too

I used to do that but it affected the part count too much for my liking. :/

the story behind munwell kerman: I EVA'd, and then uh, the kraken, uh, it hit munwell with all its might, Dun worry i rescued all 6 kerbals (there was a crew cabin located in one of the bubble thingys.)
